abstract.text: Integrate hardware sensing features to produce augmented reality apps and games.

inlineContent.text: (AR) describes user experiences that add 2D or 3D elements to the live view from a deviceâ€™s sensors in a way that makes those elements appear to inhabit the real world. ARKit combines device motion tracking, world tracking, scene understanding, and display conveniences to simplify building an AR experience.
